name: Hex Format Editor
description: Allows viewing and editing files in a hex format editor
hexformateditor.inspectorType: Where the data inspector should be shown in the hex editor.
hexformateditor.maxFileSize: The max file size (in MB) that the editor will try to open before warning you.
hexformateditor.dataInspector.autoReveal: Whether to auto reveal the data inspector when the hex editor is opened.
hexformateditor.defaultEndianness: The endianness selected when loading the editor.
hexformateditor.columnWidth: The number of bytes per row to show in the editor.
hexformateditor.showDecodedText: Whether decoded text should be shown in the editor.
hexformateditor.showOpenFileButton: Show Hex Editor button in editor menu.
hexEditor.openFile: Open Active File in Hex Editor
